panels.title: Users that did a pickup in last 7d

targets.query: SELECT last("count_pickup_active_7d") / last("count_active_7d") * 100 FROM "karrot.users" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(previous)

panels.title: Active users that did a pickup (7d)

panels.description: Arbitrary number that roughly correlates with the time the user spends clicking around
panels.title: User activity

targets.query: SELECT sum("group_activity") AS "page impressions", sum("pickup_joined") AS "pickups joined", sum("pickup_done") AS "pickups done", sum("pickup_missed") AS "pickups missed", sum("feedback") AS "feedbacks given", sum("message") AS "messages written", sum("message_reaction") AS "message reactions", sum("group_joined") AS "new members" FROM "karrot.events" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "group"

panels.title: Active in last week (with >3 active users)

targets.query:
SELECT
  last("count_total") as "total",
  last("count_active_1d") as "active in last 1d",
  last("count_active_7d") as "active in last 7d",
  last("count_active_30d") as "active in last 30d"
FROM "karrot.group.members"
GROUP BY "group" fill(null)
